item.title: MIUI V14.0.8.0.TMBCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Pro China

Codename: nuwa

Version: V14.0.8.0.TMBCNXM | 13.0

Size: 8.3 GB

MD5: 1c42af38b64ab5891b6ebb37b7faa46e

Changelog:
[Basic experience]
Fix: Horizontal stripes appeared in some cases
[Camera]
Optimization: Bokeh in video
Optimization: Unified color rendering by different lenses
Fix: Overall stability issues

Download: Here
